collections.title: CubeWerx RADARSAT-2 Catalogue
collections.description: A sample catalogue of RADARSAT-2 products stored in S3 on AWS.

links.title: Root URL for this record collection.  At this endpoint you can retrieve a description of this catalogue as well as hypermedia controls that allow you to query the catalogue.
